p: Daily specific humidity data on a 2m grid were collected from the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA) North American Regional Reanalysis (NARR), provided by the NOAA/OAR/ESRL PSD, Boulder, Colorado, USA, from their website at http://www.esrl.noaa.gov/psd/. Values were assigned to the grid point nearest to the county centroid.
